modName: RE - Real Estate for Skyrim Patch Collection
summary: A compilation of Patches for the RE - Real Estate mod.
descriptionHtml:
********NOTICE********
[size=4]Thanks to the generosity of Caput770, work on this mod is underway despite my lack of a computer. Everyone give him a big thank you in the comments tab for me, because without him we wouldn't yet have Jaggarsfeld or Canal Home patches out!
[/size]
[u][size=5]RE - Real Estate Patch Collection[/size][/u]

[u][size=4]Introduction[/size][/u]
[size=3]I'm making these patches because I enjoy sitting in front of a computer screen for long periods of time mucking about in the creation kit. I'm weird like that. However, given that I have a busy life that doesn't revolve around mucking about in the creation kit (sadly), I cannot devote as much time to this endeavor as I would like. Please understand this and don't expect me to be pumping these things out on a daily basis. Next to each planned patch I've placed the priority. This is the general order I expect to be making these in and isn't a hard-set value. In general, player home mods take a VERY small amount of time, as it just requires me to copy/paste a Landlord's Safe into the home; on the other hand Dragonborn will take a very significant amount of time because I have to place each sign individually and configure the scripts to recognize it. Due to this aspect of varying time, don't be surprised if one day I decide to upload a patch for a lower priority mod. Don't take this as a sign that I've dropped my plans for Dragonborn, I'm just taking a small (roughly 10 minute) break from it.

I decided to make patches for Sjel Blad Castle and Jaggarsfeld because I've used both mods and I very much enjoyed them. If you are planning on requesting a patch for a player home, go right ahead by PM-ing either myself (TangoDrango) or Caput770. If you leave your request in the comments tab I can't guarantee I'll ever see it, let alone complete it.
[/size]
[size=4][u][b]Safes in Homes - COMPLETE[/b][/u][/size]
Not much to say here really. Due to size issues I've only placed safes in 4 out of the 5 homes, but honestly if you're confined to Breezehome you probably aren't running much of a real estate empire! Proudspire manor, Honeyside, Hjerim, and Vlindrel Hall all contain Landlord safes.

[u][b][size=4]Hearthfire Patch - COMPLETE
[/size][/b][/u]Available for download.  Adds safes to Windstad Manor, Lakeview Manor, and Heljarchen Hall.

[b][size=4][u]Thief Player Home in Riften Canal Patch - COMPLETE
[/u][/size][/b]Special thanks to CAPUT770 for making this patch!

[size=4][u][b]Jaggarsfeld Patch[b][size=4][u] - COMPLETE[/u][/size][/b]
[/b][/u][/size]Available for download.

[size=4][u][b]Sjel Blad Castle Patch[b][size=4][u] - COMPLETE[/u][/size][/b]
[/b][/u][/size]Available for download.

[size=4][u][b]Dragonborn Patch - PRIORITY: 1
[/b][/u][/size]I'm getting there. It's more time consuming than you'd expect. Also, don't expect to be able to buy the Skaal village, their fear of outsiders means that it ain't gonna happen.

[size=4][u][b]Other Home Mods - PRIORITY: 4
[/b][/u][/size]Ask and you shall receive. I do requests on my own agenda, and they have the lowest priority. I'm sorry if that bothers you, but If you can't wait for it then ask me or Caput777 how to do it yourself. It's pretty dang easy.

[u][b][size=4]Falskaar Patch - PRIORITY: 0
[/size][/b][/u]No offense to the author, but I didn't enjoy that mod as much as some others, so it didn't' make the cut into my current mod list. It is an amazing mod, and given enough requests I *might consider* doing a patch, but, seeing as I don't expect to use it myself, it probably won't be done. Sorry, but Dragonborn adds one small village and it's taking enough time already. I really don't want to spend a month making an esp I'll never even use.

[size=4][u][b]Supported Home Mods:
[/b][/u][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41612/?]Sjel Blad Castle[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38392/?]Jaggarsfeld[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53541/?]Thief player home in Riften Canal[/url]

[size=4]SHAMELESS SELF ADVERTISING![/size]
[size=3]Check out my other mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61936/?]here[/url]![/size]

[size=4][u]Special thanks to:[/u][/size]
[b]M3t4lxxx[/b] for making the RE - Real Estate mod for Skyrim
[b]Caput770[/b] - For taking up the torch and pumping out patches while I was computer-less! What a guy!
[b]Bethesda[/b] - for making the three best video games of all time (NON-DISPUTABLE): Fallout 3, Fallout: New Vegas, and The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim.
[b]My Mother[/b] - for birthing me and being a kick-ass Mom!
author: Tango Drango
